fees_page.title: Platform Tiers & Fees
fees_page.intro: Our system is designed to reward engagement and long-term participation through tiers, XP, and a dynamic fee structure.
fees_page.tiers_subtitle: Your account tier is determined by your total XP. Higher tiers unlock significant benefits on select vaults.
fees_page.fees_subtitle: Each vault has a unique fee structure tailored to its strategy. Fees are used for platform operations, liquidity provision, and future development.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_1: Deposit Fee: 20% (Tier-Reduced). The full fee amount is credited to your Bonus Points balance.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_2: Performance Fee: Flat 20%, charged only on profits generated.
fees_page.core_vault_desc_3: Lock-up Period: 1 month for any newly deposited capital.
fees_page.ape_vault_desc_1: Deposit Fee: Flat 10% (not affected by tier). Credited as Bonus Points.
fees_page.ape_vault_desc_2: Performance Fee: 40% (Tier-Reduced). Fee is reduced by 2.5% for each tier.
fees_page.xp_subtitle: XP is the measure of your contribution to the ecosystem. See your rank on the <1>XP Leaderboard</1>.
fees_page.xp_rule_1_desc: Earn 1 XP for every $10 of capital you allocate to a vault.
fees_page.xp_rule_2_desc: Earn daily XP based on the capital you have actively staked in vaults.
fees_page.xp_rule_3_desc: Earn bonus XP every time a user you referred allocates capital.
fees_page.xp_rule_4_desc: Earn 1 XP for every 10 Bonus Points the platform buys back from you.

xp_leaderboard.title: XP & Leaderboard
xp_leaderboard.subtitle: Earn XP by participating in the ecosystem and climb the tiers!
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_signup: A one-time XP bonus is awarded to the first 500 users upon registration to reward our earliest supporters. The bonus is tiered:
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_allocation: You earn XP by putting your capital to work. For every $10 you allocate to a vault (minimum $100 allocation), you receive 1 XP. A $1,000 allocation will net you 100 XP.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_referral: When a user signs up with your referral code and makes a vault allocation (minimum $100), you (the referrer) will receive XP equal to 10% of the allocation amount, EVERY TIME. If they allocate $1,000, you get 100 XP.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_staking: A future feature will reward users with XP for every week they keep their capital locked in a vault, encouraging long-term participation.
xp_leaderboard.accordion_desc_buyback: When the platform buys back your Bonus Points, you will receive XP equal to 10% of the value. A 200 Bonus Point buy-back will grant you 20 XP.

add_to_home_screen.title: Install Hyper-Strategies App
add_to_home_screen.subtitle: For the best experience, add our app to your home screen.
add_to_home_screen.step1: 1. Tap the Share icon at the bottom.
add_to_home_screen.step2: 2. Scroll down and tap 'Add to Home Screen'.

legal.disclaimer3: Trading and investing in digital assets is highly speculative and comes with many risks. The analysis / stats on the website are for informational purposes and should not be treated as investment advice.
legal.rights: All rights reserved. The content and works published on this website are governed by the copyright laws of the operating jurisdiction.

faq_page.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq_page.q1_answer: Bonus Points are our way of rewarding users who contribute capital to our vaults. When you allocate funds to a vault, a portion of that capital is converted into Bonus Points, which are valued 1:1 with USDC. This helps cover the operational and development costs of the platform, allowing us to build a better service for you.
faq_page.q2_title: Can I cash out my Bonus Points?
faq_page.q2_answer: Bonus Points are not directly cashable. They represent your contribution to the platform. Over time, as our platform generates revenue from performance fees, we will use a portion of that revenue to 'buy back' Bonus Points from users. This process converts your Bonus Points back into USDC, which is then added to your main 'Available to Allocate' balance.
faq_page.q3_title: How are withdrawals from vaults handled?
faq_page.q3_answer: When you request a withdrawal from a vault, a request is created to move your 'Tradable Capital' back to your main 'Available to Allocate' balance. This process can take a minimum of 48 hours to complete. To withdraw funds from the platform to an external wallet, you must use the 'Withdraw Funds' feature on the Wallet page after your vault withdrawal has been processed.
